page.title: 07SURVEY OF LEISURE/HOBBIES
page.content: A survey revealed that many people do craft activities at home. Apart from sheer enjoyment it also has a practical side because items often made are useful in everyday life. Most popular are knitting and sewing. Time spent on these crafts each week varies, but mostly falls between 1-5 hours. People seem to have originally learnt their craft pastimes from relatives at home, or at school, initially between the ages of 8-14. Only a few people had learnt from books. Crafts found were Chinese brush painting, cane seating, flower arranging, Jewellery and lace making, pottery, woodwork, metalwork, dress making and tailoring.
